game.board.robber

Class RobberController

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.board.robber.RobberController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller<Robber>

    public class RobberController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller<Robber>
    Represents the Controller responsible for controlling the Robber.
    Author:
    Svenja Schoett, Christoph Hermann

      • doInitializations

        public void doInitializations(Robber robber,
                              ClientConnection client)
        Description copied from interface: Controller
        Method for initializing everything, that needs to be done right after a FXML file and its controller have been loaded. It provides the possibility to pass an Object to the controller, e.g. the model object the view represents.
        Specified by:
        doInitializations in interface Controller<Robber>
        Parameters:
        robber - the object to pass to the controller.
        client - the ClientConnection used to send messages to the Server.
